title: Self-healing Ion-conducting Elastomer towards Record Efficient Flexible Perovskite Solar Cells with Excellent Recoverable Mechanical Stability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00462K, Paper
Tangyue Xue, Baojin Fan, Ke-Jian Jiang, Qiang Guo, Xiaotian Hu, Meng Su, Erjun Zhou, Yanlin Song
Recently, self-healing polymers have been introduced into perovskite systems to repair grain boundary cracks and interfacial delamination caused by bending and stretching cycles. However, self-healing polymers usually require external light,...
